name: Giant Anteater
description: The Giant Anteater is a large mammal with a long snout and bushy tail, known for its insectivorous diet.
food_note: Can consume up to 30,000 insects daily.
proportions: Length: 1.8-2.2 m, tail: 60-90 cm, weight: 18-50 kg.
reproduction: Gestation about 6 months, one infant born.
attractions: Fascinating in zoos for their unique appearance and feeding behavior.
projects_note: Vulnerable due to habitat loss; conservation programs are active.
